name: Checkered Flag
summary: As with most racing video games, the object in Checkered Flag is to complete a certain number of laps. Each lap has to be completed within the time limit. Should a player make a lap before time runs out, the clock will be significantly extended, allowing him/her to make more
info:
• 平台: Atari Lynx
  • 游戏类型: 赛车
  • 游戏引擎: Eric Ginner Jerome Strach
  • 发行日期: 1991
